questions.quote: I wish I could believe you. Hey, Elaine, do you have some free time tomorrow afternoon?
I can't. I'm meeting Uncle Leo. I saw him shoplifting at the bookstore.
Hey, uh, before you go, did you talk to Newman about getting that mail outta there?
ho ho ho ho. You know I only got two weeks left of unemployment. I got to prove I've been looking for a job to get an extension
Oh no, in and out, I made sure of that. And you'll be happy to know I perused the script and it's met with my approval.
We gotta catch the early-bird. It's only between four-thirty and six.
Yeah, yeah. But what about money? Are you strapped? Do you need a little?
. . . naw, it's just you thanked HER, and and oh, . . . what's the difference?
So , you have fleas. Maybe you keep your house in a state of disrepair. Maybe you live in squalor.
Ya know it was somebody told me they thought they saw that thing come out of a limousine.
